name: Add README badge

input.task: Add Google-style docstrings to the functions in src/core/processor.py that don't have them

input.task: Fix all ruff linting errors in src/api/handlers.py

description: Add a unit test for an existing function

name: Refactor duplicate code
description: Extract duplicate code into a helper function

input.task: Refactor the duplicate database connection code in src/db/users.py and src/db/posts.py into a shared helper

name: Add error handling
description: Add proper error handling to a function

input.task: Add proper try-except error handling to the fetch_user_data function in src/api/client.py

name: Update dependencies
description: Update a specific dependency version

input.task: Update the requests library from 2.28.0 to 2.31.0 in pyproject.toml and ensure tests still pass

name: Implement new endpoint

name: Add logging
description: Add structured logging to a module

input.task: Add structured logging using the logging module to src/services/payment.py

name: Fix security vulnerability
description: Fix a SQL injection vulnerability

input.task: Fix the SQL injection vulnerability in the search_users function in src/db/queries.py by using parameterized queries

name: Add caching
description: Add caching to a frequently called function

input.task: Add Redis caching to the get_user_profile function in src/services/user.py with a 5 minute TTL

name: Implement pagination
description: Add pagination to a list endpoint

input.task: Add cursor-based pagination to the GET /api/v1/posts endpoint in src/api/posts.py

name: Add rate limiting
description: Implement rate limiting for API endpoints

input.task: Add rate limiting (100 requests per minute per IP) to the API using a decorator in src/api/middleware.py

name: Database migration
description: Create a database migration for a new column

input.task: Create an Alembic migration to add a 'last_login_at' timestamp column to the users table

name: Add webhook handler
description: Implement a webhook handler with signature verification

input.task: Add a webhook handler for GitHub events in src/webhooks/github.py with HMAC signature verification

name: Async refactor
description: Convert sync code to async

input.task: Convert the synchronous HTTP client in src/clients/external_api.py to use async/await with httpx

name: Multi-file refactor
description: Large-scale code reorganization

input.task: Reorganize the monolithic src/main.py into separate modules: src/config.py, src/routes.py, src/middleware.py, and src/app.py
